p.d: : Nothing to worry about? Christophe is looking forward to enjoying his retirement with his family, but something's not quite right. Benoît helps Éléonore contact her father again, after three years of absence. Manuel and Véronique get to know one another, but she's uncertain about getting into a relationship... Directed by: Alexis Durand-Brault (season 4, Canada, 2017) Screenplay, dialogues: Francine Tougas, Mélissa Veilleux Cast: Sophie Lorain (Béatrice), Gabriel Arcand (Mr P), Vincent Graton (Gabriel), Pierre-Luc Brillant (Olivier-Luc), Linda Sorgini (Gin), Gabriel Sabourin (Benoît), Robert Lalonde (Christophe), Marie-France Lambert (Isabelle), Monique Spaziani (Bernadette), Marie Turgeon (Lucie), Virginie Ranger-Beauregard (Véronique), Rosalie Moreau (Océanne), Rachel Graton (Caroline), Mathieu Quesnel (Luc), Alain Zouvi (Bernard), Levi Doré (Zacharie) Genre: drama
